sentences.sContent: The broadcast will show the queen, wearing a green outfit, chatting to schoolchildren as she helps them make a collage of a nativity scene.
sentences.sContent_eng: The broadcast will show the queen, wearing a green outfit, chatting to schoolchildren as she helps them make a collage of a nativity scene.
sentences.sCn: 人们将在电视上看到女王身着绿色套装，一边和小学生们谈心，一边教他们拼贴“耶稣降生”的场景。

synos.tran: 出生；出生地；（Nativity）耶稣的诞生

words.tran: 本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的

trans.tranOther: birth or origin, esp in relation to the circumstances surrounding it
